TEXT: CARDINAL . Mrs PERSON is a secretary and lives in PERSON .

CARDINAL . On DATE she was recruited on a fixed - term contract to the accounts department of ORG . As her contract had not been renewed after CARDINAL DATE , she required ORG to reinstate her within DATE .

When that time - limit expired , the applicant applied to ORG ( “ the ORG ” ) on DATE for judicial review of her employer 's tacit refusal and recognition of the existence of a permanent contract of employment , in consideration , inter alia , of the conditions under which she had performed her duties , which , she asserted , were comparable to those obtaining in the case of an ordinary contract of employment with the administrative authorities .
CARDINAL . On DATE she asked for a date to be fixed for the hearing .

CARDINAL . On DATE the President of the ORG referred the case to ORG . The hearing was held on DATE . In a judgment delivered on that date and deposited with the registry on CARDINAL DATE the ORG declared the application inadmissible .
CARDINAL . On DATE Mrs PERSON appealed to the PERSON . According to the information supplied by her lawyer at the hearing before the ORG , the proceedings are still pending .
